    • Constructor Detail

      • AggressiveMonster

        public AggressiveMonster(double x,
                         double y,
                         java.lang.String image_path,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         int maxHP,
                         int cooldown,
                         int maxDamage)
                  throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Initialises an aggressive monster in the game.
        Parameters:
        x - The initial x coordinate of the monster.
        y - The initial y coordinate of the monster.
        image_path - The reference of the image to be used for this monster.
        name - The name of the monster.
        maxHP - The maximum health points that the monster can have.
        cooldown - The number of milliseconds the monster has to wait for attacking again.
        maxDamage - The maximum damage the monster can do in one attack.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update the monster's details in the world: moving, cooldown time, attacking and death.
        Specified by:
        update in class Monster
        Parameters:

        w - The world of the game.
